name: mirrorPlacement
description:
Given a string or array of one or two placement values, mirrors the placement
vertically or horizontally based on the first value.

Examples
```js-code
mirrorPlacement('top start') // input
['bottom', 'start'] // output

mirrorPlacement('top start', ' ') // input
'bottom start' //output
```

params.name: placement
params.description: - a string of the form '`<value>` `<value>`' or array [`<value>`, `<value>`]

params.name: delimiter
params.description: - when provided, a value with which the result array will be joined

returns.description:
- an array of values or, if the delimiter was supplied, a string of
delimiter separated values
returns.type: D extends string ? D extends " " ? PlacementPropValues : string : PlacementValueArray

title: mirrorPlacement
